function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious disease spread impacted by region type, population density, and economic status","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of COVID-19 and other contagious diseases at the ecological level","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions for high-risk regions, improve healthcare infrastructure, and establish effective testing and monitoring systems","Technologies":"Healthcare infrastructure improvements, data analytics for monitoring, testing technology","People":"Population within regions at risk","Owner":"Health authorities, local governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Complex interactions of socioeconomic factors with infection spread","Impact":"Unclear direction of impact on infection spread due to simultaneous effects at individual and population levels","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research to understand the impact of socioeconomic factors, implement tailored interventions based on research findings","Technologies":"Data analytics for research, targeted intervention strategies","People":"Population at risk, researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research organizations, public health organizations, governments"}]}
